channel.title: [614] Admin rights
channel.description:
====READ THIS FIRST==== I have to use a 602+ because i made a cache extractor that takes "animation files" instead of "models". I am trying to find the gfx, gfx2, and anim IDs of most of the dungeoneering NPC's and 562 NPC's (like corp beats etc.)so i can put fully animated 602 NPC's on a 317, 508, etc. without having to dump animation info
dont tell me to move down to a 562 or 525. Or your a fucking idiot because as far is a remember, dung NPC's came out in the 601+ protocol.
This soruce is the ONLY 602+ source that works on my computer, dont tell me to get a different source. ====
====== Problem ======
Well, i go in the character saves and try to change the rights, but when i find "rights" it has some kind of box gibberish... i tried adding a 2 behind it, which only nulls my account. its a .SER file.
anyone might know what i do.
NOTE: yes i know, im a terrible 602+ programmer, i just need to find alot of ID's that only the 602+ protocols have

item.title: [614] Admin rights
item.dc:creator: @mongoth666 mongoth666
item.description:
@mongoth666 wrote:

====READ THIS FIRST====
I have to use a 602+ because i made a cache extractor that takes “animation files” instead of “models”. I am trying to find the gfx, gfx2, and anim IDs of most of the dungeoneering NPC’s and 562 NPC’s (like corp beats etc.)so i can put fully animated 602 NPC’s on a 317, 508, etc. without having to dump animation info

dont tell me to move down to a 562 or 525. Or your a fucking idiot because as far is a remember, dung NPC’s came out in the 601+ protocol.

This soruce is the ONLY 602+ source that works on my computer, dont tell me to get a different source.

======
Problem

Well, i go in the character saves and try to change the rights, but when i find “rights” it has some kind of box gibberish… i tried adding a 2 behind it, which only nulls my account. its a .SER file.

anyone might know what i do.

NOTE: yes i know, im a terrible 602+ programmer, i just need to find alot of ID’s that only the 602+ protocols have
